summary: Fortune hunters from all over the country rush to the Klondike in 1897 to seek their fortunes in the gold are tested by hardships of the journey.
cast: Dolores del Rio|Ralph Forbes|Karl Dane|Harry Carey|Tully Marshall|George Cooper|Russell Simpson|Emily Fitzroy|Tenen Holtz|Cesare Gravina|Doris Lloyd|E. Alyn Warren|Johnny Downs|Ray Hallor|Ray Gallagher|Rita Claire|Josephine Adair|Francis Ford|Mark Hamilton|Carmencita Johnson|Cullen Johnson|Roscoe Karns|Polly Moran|Scott Seaton|Jacques Tourneur|Benay Venuta
title: The Trail of '98
